title: Eco-Friendly Gadget Gifts for the Climate-Conscious Techie
sub_head: From an energy-monitoring plug to a mouse made of recovered ocean plastic, these electronics were made with sustainability in mind
body:
The world’s governments recently agreed on emissions cuts to slow the impact of climate change. There are ways people can share in the effort at home, too.
When it comes to buying and using electronics, a helpful adage from fashion designer Vivienne Westwood has stuck with me: “Buy less, choose well and make it last.”
